extracted.description: Pannacotta Fugo (パンナコッタ・フーゴ, Pannakotta Fūgo) is a side character and former ally featured in Vento Aureo, and the main protagonist in the Light Novel, Purple Haze Feedback. A young and quick-tempered strategist, Fugo is a member of Bucciarati's team and, by extension, Passione. He follows...
extracted.ogDescription: Pannacotta Fugo (パンナコッタ・フーゴ, Pannakotta Fūgo) is a side character and former ally featured in Vento Aureo, and the main protagonist in the Light Novel, Purple Haze Feedback. A young and quick-tempered strategist, Fugo is a member of Bucciarati's team and, by extension, Passione. He follows Giorno and Bucciarati in their mission to protect Trish Una. In addition to being one of the more calculated members on the team, he possesses the insanely deadly Stand, Purple Haze. Pannacotta Fugo is a...

extracted.title: Digimon Adventure 02 - Wikimon - The #1 Digimon wiki
extracted.textSample: Digimon Adventure 02 - Wikimon - The #1 Digimon wiki Digimon Adventure 02 From Wikimon Director Yukio Kaizawa Kakudou Hiroyuki Screenwriter Maekawa Atsushi Yoshimura Genki Character Design Animator Character Designer Nakatsuru Katsuyoshi Animation Director Nobuzane Setsuko Producer Seki Hiromi Planning Assistant Composer Arisawa Takanori Studio Toei Animation Network Fuji TV Duration April 2, 2000 - March 25, 2001 August 19, 2000 - May 19, 2001 Official Site Digimon Adventure 02 Official Site Next Series Digimon Tamers Previous Series Digimon Adventure Episodes Digimon Adventure 02 (デジモンアドベンチャー 02 Dejimon Adobanchaa 02 ) is the second anime series of the Digimon franchise . It is part of the Digimon Adventure continuity . This season aired on Sundays at 9:00 AM UTC+9 on Fuji TV, replacing Digimon Adventure (デジモンアドベンチャー) commencing on April 2, 2000 and ending on March 25, 2001. The Digimon storyline was remodeled after its departing and was succeeded by the third Digimon series Digimon Tamers (デジモンテイマーズ) in the early spring of 2001, one year after Digimon 02's airing date. (still under construction) Contents 1 Story 1.1 Overview 1.1.1 Digimon Kaiser Arc (Episodes 1-23) 1.1.2 Jogress

Official Site Next Series Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna Previous Series Digimon Savers The Movie: Ultimate Power! Activate Burst Mode!! Episodes Digimon Adventure tri. (デジモンアドベンチャー ｔｒｉ ( トライ ) ．, Dejimon Adobenchā torai ), often shortened as Digimon tri. (デジモン ｔｒｉ ( トライ ) ．, Dejimon torai ) [1] , is the 9th animated movie of the Digimon franchise . It was released as six separate films. This series is part of the Digimon Adventure 15th Anniversary . [N 1] Contents 1 History 2 Story 2.1 Digimon Adventure tri. extracted.title: Mysterious Man - Wikimon - The #1 Digimon wiki
extracted.textSample: Mysterious Man - Wikimon - The #1 Digimon wiki Mysterious Man From Wikimon Mysterious Man Kanji/Kana 謎の男 Dub Name Dark Gennai Digimon Used Imperialdramon: Dragon Mode > Imperialdramon Fighter Mode , Mugendramon , Metal Seadramon , Devimon Master Yggdrasill Voice Actor Hirata Hiroaki (平田 広明) Jeff Nimoy / Todd Haberkorn (Digimon Emperor) The Mysterious Man (謎の男, Nazo no Otoko ) is a Digital Lifeform who acts as a servant of Yggdrasill in Digimon Adventure tri. , taking the guises of Gennai and the Digimon Kaiser . Contents 1 Profile 2 Appearances 2.1 Anime 2.1.1 Digimon Adventure tri. 3 Image Gallery 3.1 Artwork Profile [ edit ] He is psychotic, cruel, always laughing hysterically and likes to do evil as a joke for his own entertainment. Similar to Yggdrasil, it wants a world where Digimon and Humans do not coexist. Has the form of Gennai who once helped the “Chosen Children” in the Digital World, but has no direct connection with Gennai himself. After Ordinemon was defeated, it disappeared into a “distortion”. Appearances [ edit ] Anime [ edit ] Digimon Adventure tri. [ edit ] The Mysterious Man is a villain who disguises himself to deceive the Chosen Children . He makes his first a

extracted.textSample: World of Darkness - Wikimon - The #1 Digimon wiki World of Darkness From Wikimon The World of Darkness (暗黒の世界 Ankoku no Sekai , 闇の世界 Yami no Sekai ) is seen primarily in Digimon Adventure 02 . However, we get a glimpse of what might be a part of it near the end of Digimon Adventure , when Yamato and Sora fall into Dark Caves. Contents 1 Digimon Adventure 2 Digimon Adventure 02 3 Digimon Adventure tri. 4 Super Evolution Stage "Digimon Adventure tri. ~Adventure of August 1~" 5 To Our Future! Digimon Adventure [ edit ] Digimon Adventure 02 [ edit ] At some point between Digimon Adventure and Digimon Adventure 02, Ken was transported into this world. When he submerged his Digivice into the Dagomon's Ocean, it changed into a black D-3 and he began his change into the Digimon Kaiser. In Digimon Adventure 02 - Episode 13 , Hikari was transported there. She encountered what first appeared to be Hangyomon lacking diving gear, with Evil Spirals on their person. However, the Evil Spirals did not seem to be controlling them, but instead sapped their energy. They said the god they worshiped had done this to them. Hikari tried removing them, but an Airdramon with an Evil Ring on it attacked the
